Topic.Title: The Great Something, ACT I: B.R.O. - (the extraordinarily stupid tale of a former content chaser)

Posts.EditableText: Hey guys. This was my first game (on any platform). I thought I 'released' it over a year ago but just noticed I never made it public. It's a short game with lots of 'features' and original music. I almost finished Act II before moving on to creating other types of games but I might come back and finish it one day. Either way... it would be cool if you'd have a looksie on Act I. Link to game (on this site) Be well, stay safe! //Cheese Edit: I'd also appreciate highly if a moderator could take a look at the game and maybe list it for me :)
Posts.HTML:
Hey guys.
This was my first game (on any platform). I thought I 'released' it over a year ago but just noticed I never made it public.
It's a short game with lots of 'features' and original music.

I almost finished Act II before moving on to creating other types of games but I might come back and finish it one day.
Either way... it would be cool if you'd have a looksie on Act I.

Link to game (on this site)

Be well, stay safe!
//Cheese

Edit:
I'd also appreciate highly if a moderator could take a look at the game and maybe list it for me :)
